data.text: @caleycook Hi Caley! Do you still need our help? The check in online from mobile devices is not always performant. Let us know!
The Venice Carnival is about to begin! Are you ready to get into full swing with a bauta or a colombina? https://t.co/6tCW6HcH12 #TravelTips
Salvatore is one of our youngest flight attendants. Have you already met him on board? #airdolomiti25 https://t.co/tyNWGwkAbI
Michele of the Crew Coordination Team is without a doubt a very E-F-F-I-C-I-E-N-T colleague! ;-) #airdolomiti25 https://t.co/k8vECSRIQn
Siete mai stati a Monaco di Baviera per il Fasching? Approffittate subito dell'offerta da 106€ a/r! https://t.co/3xTJaHMyir
Here she comes, Chiara of the HR Department! She's lovely but also very picky! #airdolomiti25 https://t.co/RPz1Prhzsa
Il 21 gennaio ricorrerà il 25esimo dal primo volo e brinderemo con @FerrariTrento https://t.co/owgH4T3Jmj #airdolomiti25 #AlSettimoCielo
Ladies and Gentlemen, this is your captain speaking :-) https://t.co/Ps7nPgc2eD  #airdolomiti25
3, 2, 1... Marta of the Crew Coordination Team! They work hard to plan the best shifts for our crews #airdolomiti25 https://t.co/8imAemiibC
3, 2, 1... Marta of the Network and Commercial Team! They are always considering new routes ;-) https://t.co/CT4mevkcb7 #airdolomiti25
Today is Federica's turn! The Inflight Product Team is always looking for the yummiest meals! #airdolomiti25 https://t.co/BPdqA2BT7a
Michela and the Revenue Accounting Team keep always our budget in order ;-) #airdolomiti25 https://t.co/Esr4g2buho
Attention to details is one of the important qualities to work with Lorenzo in our Maintenance Team https://t.co/pSwF3Szh4B #airdolomiti25
Have you ever met Veronica? She's the bubbly blondie of our Outdoor Sales Team! #airdolomiti25 https://t.co/ex3NTjHTRu
Here she is, Giorgia of the Sales Center! Have you recognised her always happy voice? #airdolomiti25 https://t.co/YTO4aQPYDY
We wish you a fabulous New Year! #AirDolomiti #VoliamoConTe #AlSettimoCielo https://t.co/xBeqgVxY5W
Flying over the #Venice #lagoon at sunrise... Special thanks to our flight attendant ElenaB! #AlSettimoCielo https://t.co/ddnifZVE2V
Close-up of our tail by one of our youngest spotters from BLQ who's studying to become a pilot! Good luck Enrico! 🍀 https://t.co/nHLhkoZRHd
Are you a #FashionLover? Don't miss the A/W 2016/17 collections at #PittiImmagine Uomo and Bimbo in #Florence! https://t.co/rydTgmjfbr
We wish you all love and happiness during this Holiday Season and throughout the New Year! #VoliamoConTe https://t.co/TmHZAyVHvN
Just before boarding... Thanks @aviation_spotting for this and the other cool photos! ✈ #avgeek #AirDolomiti #e195 https://t.co/onRNVN36zn
Among the most beautiful cities in the world #Venice is the only one that can be described as unique https://t.co/pr7kpORPet #TravelTips
Qualche settimana fa @Manuela_Vitulli è stata a #Monaco con noi ai #mercatini di #Natale e ce l'ha raccontato qui https://t.co/2dO95v4BzL
We know Xmas is coming when we find the first ice crystals on our windows. And you? #VoliamoConTe #AlSettimoCielo https://t.co/MTSHWCQ22S
@bimbieviaggi ottima idea! Ce ne sono per tutti i gusti...e tutti i portafogli ;-)
Nel periodo di #Natale i nostri crew saranno lieti di addolcire il vostro volo con una stellina #Caffarel 🌟🌟 https://t.co/QrfECiSED7
#AirDolomitiShop - Need the perfect #Christmas #gift? Have a look! https://t.co/YMkNi621ZO https://t.co/Pv0hEBlR9H
.@michal_subel Thank you so much, you made us blush! :-) We were honored to have you on board and look forward to welcoming you soon again!
Grazie di averci inseriti nella vostra #guidaviaggi in #aereo con #bambini @Quantomanca_com! #VoliamoConTe https://t.co/HAOXIoIuwO
Magical Munich! #VoliamoConTe #AlSettimoCielo @bimbieviaggi  https://t.co/b5aJd8s5sW
Can you spot him? ;-) #ManOnTheMoon #AlSettimoCielo https://t.co/X7tIfL4IJS
#AlSettimoCielo con Babbo Natale ;-) https://t.co/Vf9WBxqrHU
#Capodanno indimenticabile a #Monaco! #VoliamoConTe da #Bologna #Bari #Verona #Venezia #Firenze https://t.co/pvhecFG8qd #TravelTips

RT @Manuela_Vitulli: #Monaco di Baviera. Birra e non solo! 
https://t.co/4nyYynApvP
#VoliamoConTe @Air_Dolomiti https://t.co/bXb3Mteyfb
@take_it_to_go How was your flight? @lufthansa
@take_it_to_go Air Dolomiti is a member of Lufthansa Regional since July 2003 https://t.co/cfrYE6pTlE. We were honored to have you onboard.
@danilop we're very sorry about it, but we have no "bargaining power" with the fog :/ The #safety of passengers is our primary concern.
@ioana_cis @slsoftworks Since February 2009 we have been flying a fleet of Embraer 195s. Do you remember flying on our ATRs?
@simonjwoolf Thank you for sharing your impressions about our inflight service! We're glad that you appreciated our wines! Have a nice stay!
L'esperienza unica dei #mercatini di #Natale a #Monaco... e tanto altro! Grazie @Manuela_Vitulli e alla prossima!  https://t.co/e6dB8tCyFc
@RosanaArgento Ci fa piacere! Monaco è magica soprattutto a Natale!
Travel makes one modest. You see what a tiny place you occupy in the world. – Gustave Flaubert #VoliamoConTe https://t.co/aVpXUmTU23
Our #Embraer at Schipohol's Airport Amsterdam :-) Thanks @michelblacky for sharing it! #avgeek #e195  https://t.co/HJ31GB9O47
#Monaco di Baviera tra lucine, mercatini di #Natale e attrazioni per un soggiorno a misura di #famiglia! https://t.co/SmmHsgextX #TravelTips
Ciao @inogniviaggio, grazie a te pe ril retweet! ;-)
@Manuela_Vitulli siamo felici di leggerti! ;-)
Spendere i propri soldi per viaggiare fa bene, lo dice la scienza https://t.co/nBulqeBKcx via @HuffPostItalia #VoliamoConTe
Spazio Italia Magazine is on @issuu! https://t.co/b38763sQGz #VoliamoConTe #AlSettimoCielo
#Mercatini di #Monaco di Baviera: il video di @Manuela_Vitulli per darvene un assaggio! #VoliamoConTe https://t.co/9UYBQVg5Yn
Grazie @RicFelicetti per aver condiviso questa bella foto! È sempre un piacere averti a bordo! https://t.co/zBI3OIWzXt
.@Manuela_Vitulli non vediamo l'ora di ricevere altre foto e di leggere le tue impressioni di volo e viaggio! ;-) https://t.co/S5LuzMjCXl
#Florence over #Xmas: things to do and places to see in order not to miss out the best attractions! https://t.co/FAZcZ5Bc3G #TravelTips
Our #Embraers from a ramp agent point of view ;-) @ Flughafen München. Thanks Marco Russo! #avgeek #e195 https://t.co/5ADaL9ncoA
RT @BolognaWelcome: Any plans for #NewYear's Eve? #Bologna is the place to be! https://t.co/IqlvTSrKrt (Ph. https://t.co/a2QjhipzuI) https:…
@VLeggeri grazie del suggerimento, il nostro reparto Inflight ci sta già lavorando! ;-)
Anche noi! :-) Bellissima board @LaValeBellotti, complimenti! Ottimi spunti per chi vuole scoprire #Monaco https://t.co/ZIerFdDy2h
RT @Manuela_Vitulli: #AlSettimoCielo. Finalmente in partenza con @Air_Dolomiti. #Monaco arrivo!✨ #VoliAmoconTe [anche su Snapchat] https://…
Grazie @PaesediNatale!  https://t.co/dI9DEzG2ku
Non vediamo l'ora di averti a bordo e di seguirti in questa tua nuova avventura bavarese! #AlSettimoCielo  https://t.co/7aimeRBp2m
A special #offer for a special #Xmas #gift? A flight to #Bari #Florence #Venice or #Verona at €116! Book by Dec. 9! https://t.co/BkOFDCKeit
Quest'anno a #Natale regala e regalati del tempo con chi ami per iniziare al meglio il Nuovo Anno! #Monaco 116€ a/r https://t.co/4bmTK46m0t
#FlightTips - Se aspetti un bambino puoi continuare a volare con noi fino alla 36esima settimana! https://t.co/HSybDZic6C #gravidanza
#Vegetarian sandwiches + #glutenfree snacks are available on board upon request and while stock last, please ask :) https://t.co/qnhU7gVDxv
Congrats @BolognaWelcome! Awesome video! :-) #VisitBologna #AirDolomiti #VoliamoConTe #AlSettimoCielo https://t.co/36wN2EcYRB
Travel does not merely broaden the mind, it makes the mind. – Bruce Chatwin #AirDolomiti #VoliamoConTe #fridayquotes https://t.co/NiyjsokDY9
Assaporate la magia del #Natale al #Christkindlemarkt di #Monaco dal 27/11 al 24/12! https://t.co/uxrgTGjU9n #TravelTips #AirDolomiti
We can and you? #VoliamoConTe to #Bologna https://t.co/Ke70H4PHQt
@BolognaWelcome Absolutely! Can't wait! :-)
@Manuela_Vitulli Super! A Monaco poi la birra è ottima tutto l'anno, ma anche un buon Gluewein non dovrebbe mancare ;-)
@Manuela_Vitulli giusto giusto per l'apertura della stagione natalizia! ;-) Hai in programma qualcosa di particolare?
"There is a place in Verona where people who suffer can leave a message to ask Juliet for help." #VoliamoConTe https://t.co/F4FO1Bg35x
@chiccorampazzo ti consigliamo di sentire le autorità doganali per capire se ci sono restrizioni sugli insaccati. Buona giornata!
@chiccorampazzo certo! Ben impacchettato ovviamente ;-) Non ci sono restrizioni con il cibo tra Italia e Germania.
@chiccorampazzo sì ti confermiamo che non è necessario stampare nulla, quello che ricevi via mail ha lo stesso valore.
RT @BolognaWelcome: Another week in #Bologna and new events just around the corner https://t.co/HqXewOW5gl (ph: https://t.co/blq6hbS2Ad) ht…
@susanmck20 Thank you very much for your awesome comment! We feel really flattered and hope to welcome you on board soon again!
RT @Infinite_Area: Selezioni in corso per la prima "call to market" @patriziobof @Air_Dolomiti @GGIVeneto #infinitematchup #IA https://t.co…
#InfiniteArea ed #AirDolomiti insieme per reinventare il modo di viaggiare https://t.co/k3rTOPJuiH #infinitematchup https://t.co/wTBMkqB13p
@sliminat0r @lufthansa could you please let us know which flight you are referring to?
Il #ponte lungo dell'#Immacolata è il #weekend perfetto per volare a #Monaco e regalarvi un anticipo di #Natale. https://t.co/N5sYP0P3VM
Flying over the Adriatic Riviera... Special thanks to @FabioMonterisi and @MSG_spotters #embraer #avgeek #e195 https://t.co/eBEWLaMYsV
Il #brezel, il famoso pane tedesco, è stato inventato nei monasteri francesi e italiani. Lo sapevate? https://t.co/GzG9dKVHPL #sapevatelo
#NewYearsEve in #Venice, why not? Don't miss our #offer at €155 rt valid until 15/11!  https://t.co/jK81jKp2O8 https://t.co/isEKutvqmN
Il "percorso da sogno" è un trekking di 550km che da #Monaco porta a #Venezia. Di quante tappe è composto?
#NewYearsEve 2016 in Italy - Discover our #offer at €155 round trip! https://t.co/Z0VayhAaLh #Promo #AlSettimoCielo https://t.co/p6sUVlFrqz
#Promo #Capodanno per brindare a #Monaco: €155 a/r tutto incluso! https://t.co/6UIMV8wnlg Valida fino al 15/11! https://t.co/opCtzCeNUX
RT @BolognaWelcome: Have u ever stopped to observe up close the towers of #Bologna?https://t.co/qMqr5Y454u (pic:https://t.co/N3kzoDMhDk) ht…
RT @PITISPOTTERCLUB: Take-off from @BLQairport inbound @MUC_Airport ! @Air_Dolomiti @embraer #avgeek https://t.co/IlwUFaEeM1
If horses are your passion, don't miss #FieraCavalli from 5/11 to 8/11 in #Verona! https://t.co/IHDpxLl4I2 @fieracavalli #horselove
@katrinstrauch we're glad to hear that and we wish you a nice day!
A taste of what you will find on board from 5/11 till the end of March, if you'll fly business ;-) #AlSettimoCielo https://t.co/UxkjQ0yCBv
What are you waiting for? ;-) #VisitItaly #VisitBologna #AirDolomiti #VoliamoConTe https://t.co/GrOfUTddQP
@katrinstrauch Hi, we're terribly sorry for your disappointment. Yet we hope that you finally received the support you needed.
Quando si viaggia #light bisogna essere molto selettive, vero @SacriSimo? Ecco come fare https://t.co/kxTc2jr6Nl #AirDolomiti #VoliamoConTe
Thanks for your nice shot @PITISPOTTERCLUB! We wish you a nice day and a great week!  https://t.co/qI6xkX0CTq
@Master_Ipse Thank you! We will pass your compliments on our pilot right away! Looking forward to welcoming you on board soon! :-)
Good Monday Morning! We're just a tweet away! ;-) #AirDolomiti #VoliamoConTe https://t.co/fc5jDFOSQC https://t.co/fc5jDFOSQC
@Manuela_Vitulli @ClaSantovito Grazie Manuela, grazie davvero! Buona settimana e arrivederci a presto sui nostri voli!
EFFICIENT, CAREFUL, DYNAMIC... and LIKE YOU! :-) https://t.co/kaaLDc5nNr #AirDolomiti #VoliamoConTe #AlSettimoCielo
Have you ever been in #Florence in #November? Seize the moment and book your flight at €175! https://t.co/M39954uKPn https://t.co/Z5Gsm3PB9j

errors.title: Authorization Error
errors.detail: Sorry, you are not authorized to see the user with entities.mentions.username: [RosanaArgento].
